title: Cowboy from the Future
description: Adeline Mulhaney’s “Glamping Retreat” is the worst vacation ever. The campfire sing-alongs are bad enough, but then she’s somehow transported sixteen hundred years into the future. Only instead of flying cars, this future is filled with buffalo-sized lizards and laser-gun showdowns in the streets. If Addy’s ever getting back to the twenty-first century, she’ll need help from a certain super-handsome cowboy with superpowers.Cade Westin is pretty sure Addy’s crazy, when she moves into his hotel. But, then her life is threatened and not even wild Ghaa beasts can stop Cade from riding to the rescue. He isn’t sure where that redheaded lunatic comes from, but deep down he knows that Addy only belongs with him.M/FHappily Ever AfterTime travel romance, Western romance, post-apocalyptic romance, grumpy/sunshine.97,000 + wordsStandalone book
author: Cassandra Gannon
